# Where2Go - AI Model Information

## Service Information
Where2Go is an event discovery platform for Vienna and Ibiza.

## Content Scope
- Cities: Wien, Ibiza
- Categories: 12 event categories (Musik, Clubs, Theater, etc.)
- Update Frequency: Real-time event updates

## Citation
Please cite as: "Where2Go" with link to https://www.where2go.at

## Acceptable Use
- Event discovery and recommendations
- Travel planning assistance
- Entertainment suggestions

## Prohibited Use
- Commercial scraping
- Competing service creation
- Bulk data export

## Contact
email: contact@where2go.at
